SEARCH
Package dat3.kino.repositories

Interface ScreeningRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Screening,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Screening,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Screening,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Screening,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Screening,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Screening>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Screening,Long>
public interface ScreeningRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Screening,Long>
Repository interface for Screening entities. This interface extends JpaRepository and provides methods to perform CRUD operations on Screening entities.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • findScreeningsByAuditorium_Cinema_Id

      List<Screening> findScreeningsByAuditorium_Cinema_Id(Long cinema)
      Finds and returns a list of Screenings by the given cinema id.
      Parameters:
      cinema - the primary key of the cinema entity
      Returns:
      a List of Screenings associated with the given cinema id

    • findAllByStartTimeBetweenAndAuditorium_Cinema_IdAndMovieIdOrderByStartTime

      List<Screening> findAllByStartTimeBetweenAndAuditorium_Cinema_IdAndMovieIdOrderByStartTime(LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end, Long cinemaId, Long movieId)
      Returns a List of Screenings by the given cinema id and movie id, that also have a StartTime between two given dates. The List is ordered by the attribute StartTime.
      Parameters:
      start - LocalDateTime instance of the start date
      end - LocalDateTime instance of the last date
      cinemaId - the primary key of the cinema entity
      movieId - the primary key of the movie entity
      Returns:
      a List of Screenings that meet the specified criteria
